ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Compatibility
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description: Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Alpha Animals - Animals Logic - Fertile Fields - Genetic Rim - Path Avoid - Power Switch - RimFridge - Simple Sidearms - Sparkling Worlds - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Vanilla Events Expanded - Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security
